description:
The 185 merino tangram logo t-shirt for men is perfect for athletic winter tours, even when the going gets tough.

the t-shirt is made from fine 100% merino wool produced in accordance with the ortovox wool promise. Its temperature- and moisture-regulating properties make the t-shirt a naturally functional companion for freeriding and ski touring. The merino wool is comfortably soft on the skin. The reason for the high quality and functionality of this fine wool is that the tasmanian merino sheep enjoy optimum living conditions. In the natural paradise of tasmania, they benefit from rich pastures, a seemingly unlimited habitat and a moderate climate.

the 185 merino tangram logo shirt for men features a stylish, casual design in trendy colors and is impressively versatile when it comes to winter alpine tours.
name: Ortovox 185 Merino Tangram Logo T-Shirt - Mens
